title: Package Development Notes
text: Contains daily notes details things developed. Primarily following https://r-pkgs.org/.

title: Package Development Notes
text: Added package dependencies readxl, stringr, dplyr, tidyr, rlang use_package() Added unit testing structure use_testthat(); created initial (toy) test use_test("hsr_extract_coefficients") Added README file usethis::use_readme_rmd() built default .md file build_readme() final check(), still one (expected) note (resolve later) Added NEWS.md use_news_md() Added badges (anticipation): use_cran_badge(), use_coverage(), use_github_action("check-standard") Added logo (created hexmake + ChatGPT): use_logo() Started package website use_pkgdown() pkgdown::build_site() get initial site used usethis::use_pkgdown_github_pages() create GitHub Actions workflow update site commit/push. automatically configures GitHub (branch created Pages configured). need push site pkgdown stuff yet.

title: Package Development Notes
text: Initialized package creating repo : https://github.com/centralstatz/readmit created New Folder Git Positron, cloning repo used usethis::create_package(getwd()) initialize package template Added file DEVNOTES.md .Rbuildignore Ran usethis::use_r("hsr_extract_coefficients") create packages first function, extracts list model coefficients CMS Hospital Specific Report (HSR) specified cohort. Added argument checks. Used devtools::load_all() test (works locally downloaded report). initial devtools::check() got various warnings/notes, expected nothing configured yet. Edited DESCRIPTION file (possibly change time package evolves), added MIT license usethis::use_mit_license() Added roxygen2 documentation function. Used devtools::document() document . Added \dontrun roxygen function example doesn’t work yet. Need put external data package. Still warning/note haven’t declared dependencies, soon. Starting next…
